content:
TIME OUT SAYS Guetta. A$AP Rocky. 50 Cent. Busta Rhymes. French Montana. Rita Ora. Sean Paul. Fetty Wap. G-Eazy. Nas. 甚至还有Jennifer Lopez… 在 BASE 登上舞台的音乐界最伟大的演员阵容每年都在增长。

 

在过去的 12 个月里，它在 2018 年 Time Out 迪拜音乐和夜生活奖中获得了年度俱乐部称号。它继续以惊人的速度吸引一线明星和人群，看到它在 2019 年的颁奖典礼上获得了高度赞扬的奖章。

 

对于新人：BASE 每周三晚在周四、周五和周六开放（猜中者无奖），是迪拜设计区的一个露天俱乐部。就像它所在的区域一样，它吸引了城市前卫和都市风格的人群。他们成群结队地到达，渴望一夜的脉动节拍、频闪灯和准备登上中央平台的常规顶级表演者。

 

舞池、酒吧和私人桌子环绕着高架舞台，在 DJ 宣布：“每个人都准备好了吗？”是的。每个人都在这里庆祝。饮料很快就上来了——虽然不便宜，但不像城里其他一些超级俱乐部进口的那样定价过高——而且人群很high。 DJ 混合了热门歌曲和经典嘻哈音乐。一切顺利，然后主要表演开始。
contentEn:
TIME OUT SAYS Guetta. A$AP Rocky. 50 Cent. Busta Rhymes. French Montana. Rita Ora. Sean Paul. Fetty Wap. G-Eazy. Nas. Even Jennifer Lopez… The stellar line-up of music’s biggest acts taking to the stage at BASE only grows stronger every year.

 

The past 12 months kicked off with it scooping the Club of the Year title at the Time Out Dubai Music & Nightlife Awards 2018. It has continued to pul in A-listers and crowds at a remarkable pace, seeing it pick up a Highly Commended gong at the 2019 awards.

 

For the uninitiated: BASE opens three nights a week Thursday, Friday and Saturday (no prizes for guessing those) and is an open-air club in Dubai Design District. Just like the area it sits in, it attracts a crowd of the city’s edgy and urban styled. They arrive in droves eager for a night of pulsating beats, strobe lights and regular top performers ready to hit the central platform.

 

The dancefloor, bar and private tables surround the elevated stage, which is energetically taken to by the club’s resident dancers in between DJ announcements of: “Is everyone ready to parrrdayyy?” Yes. Everyone’s here to parday. Drinks are quick to be served – while not cheap, they’re not over-priced like some other super-club imports in the city – and the crowd’s energy is high. DJs spin a mix of chart hits and classic hip-hop. It’s all going well, then the main act comes out. And it goes off.
remarks:

address: Dubai Design District - Dubai - United Arab Emirates
